content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, glad to meet you. I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. I'm thinking of renting this apartment for a minimum of 1,500 euros per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That seems a little high for an unfurnished apartment, especially considering it's not in a prime location. I would suggest 1,000 euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
I understand your concern, but I'm afraid I can't go that low. The apartment is brand new and has been renovated with high-quality materials, and it's located in a safe and convenient area. I believe it's worth more than 1,000 euros per month.

However, I'm willing to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at 1,250 euros per month? That way, we can both feel good about the deal. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds much more reasonable. You mentioned the apartment is brand new and has been renovated. Can you assure me that the renovation is top-notch and won't cause any issues in the future?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Absolutely! The renovation was done with high-quality materials and by a reputable contractor. I can provide you with references from previous tenants who have been very satisfied with the condition of the apartment. Additionally, I have a maintenance fund in place to ensure that any issues that may arise in the future are addressed promptly and professionally. You can rest assured that you'll be moving into a comfortable and well-maintained home.

Now, let's talk about the lease term. I'm open to negotiating the length of the lease to fit your needs. Would you prefer a 6-month or 12-month lease? And do you have any specific move-in dates in mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the clarification, Mr. Abbasi. I appreciate the effort you've put into ensuring the apartment's quality. I'm comfortable with the 1,250 euros per month price for a 12-month lease. I plan to move in within the next month, so the sooner we can finalize the lease, the better.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Great, I'm glad we could come to an agreement. I'll have the lease agreement drafted and sent to you within the next 24 hours. In the meantime, I'll also schedule a walk-through inspection of the apartment with you, so you can see the condition of the property firsthand.

As for the move-in date, how does next Wednesday sound? If that doesn't work for you, we can schedule an alternative date that suits your needs.

Finally, I'll need a security deposit of 1,250 euros, which will be refundable at the end of the lease term, provided there's no damage to the property. We can discuss the details of the security deposit further in the lease agreement.

Does everything sound good to you so far?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, everything sounds good to me. I'm pleased with the agreement we've reached. I agree to the price of 1,250 euros per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Wonderful! I'm glad we could come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'll have the lease agreement drafted and sent to you for review and signature.

As a final step, I'll need to schedule a walk-through inspection of the apartment with you to ensure that everything is in order and to answer any questions you may have. How does next Wednesday at 2 PM sound for the walk-through? If that doesn't work for you, we can schedule an alternative date and time that suits your schedule.

Once the walk-through is complete and the lease agreement is signed, you'll be able to move in and enjoy your new home!

I'm looking forward to welcoming you as a tenant. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns in the meantime.
